attributes.action: Maintain rights of EU citizens after BREXIT only if they contribute to society.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned British and EU citizens believe that EU citizens rights should be maintained only if they contribute to society. Social housing and benefits should be for British people first . Only after paying in for 5 whole years should free NHS care , housing and benefits. Benefit tourism is a joke and gives genuine migrants a bad name . New arrivals will need health insurance a job etc. Deport those who are taking the mickey out of our country.
attributes.background: They country voted as a majority for Brexit ie to leave the European union.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
